title: Police: Trio used stolen gun to rob, kill 2 in California
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Entertainment - Today 
Three young transients used a handgun that was stolen from an unlocked car to rob and kill a backpacking Canadian tourist in Golden Gate Par... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
